code: @Override public void run() {     String line.     if (output != null) {         StringBuilder msg = new StringBuilder().         try {             while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {                 msg.append(line).                 msg.append("\n").             }         } catch (IOException ignored) {         } finally {             output.set(msg.toString()).         }     } else {         try {             while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {                 System.out.println(line).                 System.out.flush().             }         } catch (IOException ignored) {         }     } }
